pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Cleansing Acne Bar for Face & Body 95g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Cleansing Acne Bar for Face & Body with exfoliating crushed tea tree leaves helps prevent the occurrence of acne and pimples the tea tree way.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Cleansing Acne Bar for Face & Body, extracts even more goodness from the Australian tea tree plant by harnessing 100% pure Tea Tree Oil as well as crushed tea tree leaves, to cleanse, purify and exfoliate skin while helping to prevent the occurrence of acne and pimples. This product is Vegan friendly. 99% naturally derived

Boxed Contents: soap bar

Size: 95g

Scent: tea tree

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Helps to prevent the occurrence of acne and pimples by cleansing the skin
• made with 100% pure Australian tea tree oil, with an antibacterial action
• Gently exfoliates thanks to crushes tea tree leaves, and helps to remove the build-up of oil and dirt
• 99% naturally derived
• Vegan friendly

Warnings

For external use only. Skin patch test prior to use. If sensitivity occurs discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Glycerin, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Powder,Tocopheryl Acetate, Palm Acid, Palm Kernel Acid, Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate.

Contains: Crushed tea tree leaves

Directions

Wet skin and apply to the body to create lather. Rinse thoroughly.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a dry place below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
